## 初始化

### \~\etc\Rconsole 

```         
language = en
```

### \~etc\Rprofile.site

```{r}
options(timeout = 300)
options("timeout")
# set a CRAN mirror

options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cran.rstudio.com/")) # "https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/CRAN/"
options(BioC_mirror = "https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/bioconductor")


options("repos")
options("BioC_mirror")


.First <- function() {
    library(showtext, quietly = T)
    font_add("Times New Roman Regular", "C:/Windows/Fonts/times.ttf")
    font_add("Times New Roman Bold", "C:/Windows/Fonts/timesbd.ttf")
    font_add("Times New Roman Bold Italic", "C:/Windows/Fonts/timesbi.ttf")
    font_add("Times New Roman Italic", "C:/Windows/Fonts/timesi.ttf")
    font_add("黑体 常规", "C:/Windows/Fonts/simhei.ttf")
    font_add("楷体 常规", "C:/Windows/Fonts/simkai.ttf")
    font_add("宋体 常规", "C:/Windows/Fonts/simsun.ttc")
    showtext_auto()

    library(tidyverse)
    library(conflicted)
    conflict_scout()
    conflicts_prefer(GenomicRanges::setdiff)
    conflicts_prefer(dplyr::filter)
    conflicts_prefer(dplyr::select)
    library(readxl)
    library(writexl)
    # library(data.table)
    library(BiocManager)
}


.Last <- function() {
    now()
}
```
